allow: Bash(bun -e "import { Database } from ''bun:sqlite''; const db = new Database\(require\(''os''\).homedir\(\) + ''/.memory-nexus/memory.db''\); console.log\(db.query\(''SELECT DISTINCT project FROM sessions''\).all\(\)\);")

Bash(bun -e "import { Database } from ''bun:sqlite''; const db = new Database\(require\(''os''\).homedir\(\) + ''/.memory-nexus/memory.db''\); console.log\(db.query\(""SELECT sql FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=''table''""\).all\(\)\);")

Bash(bun -e "import { Database } from ''bun:sqlite''; const db = new Database\(require\(''os''\).homedir\(\) + ''/.memory-nexus/memory.db''\); console.log\(db.query\(''SELECT DISTINCT project_name FROM sessions''\).all\(\)\);")

Bash(bun -e "import { Database } from ''bun:sqlite''; const db = new Database\(require\(''os''\).homedir\(\) + ''/.memory-nexus/memory.db''\); console.log\(db.query\(''SELECT DISTINCT project_path_encoded, project_path_decoded, project_name FROM sessions LIMIT 5''\).all\(\)\);")
